static class WebRepository.WebActionCallback

public void pullObject(BackedObject bo)
Pull the object into the local repository by adding it if it doesn't exist, or updating it if it does exist *NOTE: If this BackedObject is a Requirement or Fulfillment, its parent MUST exist locally before invoking this method.
